screen.energymod.title: Wire Configuration
book.energymod.wiki.title: Energy Mod Wiki
book.energymod.wiki.author: EnergyMod
book.energymod.wiki.page1: Energy cells store FE. Use wires to transfer energy. Toggle modes with the Wire Tool.
book.energymod.wiki.page2: Wire recipe: three copper ingots and one lead ingot = 4 wires. Generators produce FE.
book.energymod.wiki.page3: Wires have TAKE, GIVE and DISABLED modes. Auto mode pulls from generators automatically.
book.energymod.wiki.page4: Energy cells of higher tier hold more FE: 100k, 1M and 10M respectively.
book.energymod.wiki.page5: Infinite cells start filled and supply endless FE for testing machines.
book.energymod.wiki.page6: Solar panels work only during the day and stop when it rains.
book.energymod.wiki.page7: Thermal generators depend on biome temperature and nearby lava.
book.energymod.wiki.page8: Wind turbines produce power high above ground and spin faster in storms.
book.energymod.wiki.page9: Use the Metal Filler to craft cast iron with coal and FE.
book.energymod.wiki.page10: All blocks support Forge and Mekanism energy capabilities for compatibility.
